summary: This is an internal FBI and DHS email chain from October 2019 regarding the opening of a Preliminary Investigation into CBPAS Timothy Routch based on reported incidents involving him and Jeffrey Epstein during Routch's assignment in St. Thomas, USVI from 2008-2016. The FBI is coordinating with Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking units.

persons.name: Timothy Routch
persons.role: CBPAS (Customs and Border Protection Agriculture Specialist)
persons.context: Subject of a Preliminary Investigation regarding reported incidents involving Jeffrey Epstein during his assignment in St. Thomas, USVI from 2008-2016.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Reported to have been involved in incidents with CBPAS Timothy Routch during Routch's USVI assignment.

persons.name: Matt
persons.context: Instructed to open a 58A Preliminary Investigation upon return to the office.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Copied on the email for awareness regarding a matter discussed the previous week.

connections.description: Reported incidents involving both individuals during Routch's assignment in St. Thomas, USVI, prompting a law enforcement investigation.
FBI colleagues coordinating on the opening of a Preliminary Investigation into Timothy Routch.

events.title: FBI Opens Preliminary Investigation on Routch
events.description: The FBI New York office decides to open a Preliminary Investigation (58A PI) based on information regarding incidents involving CBPAS Timothy Routch and Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Routch's USVI Assignment
events.description: CBPAS Timothy Routch worked in the Pre-Clearance St. Thomas, USVI location, which is the period when the reported incidents with Epstein occurred.

events.title: Routch Transfers to Charleston
events.description: Timothy Routch reported to the port of Charleston, South Carolina, ending his assignment in USVI.

keyFacts: A Preliminary Investigation (58A PI) was opened by the FBI in October 2019 regarding CBPAS Timothy Routch and his alleged incidents with Jeffrey Epstein.
The reported incidents took place during Routch's seven-year assignment (2008-2016) in the Pre-Clearance St. Thomas, USVI location.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children / Human Trafficking unit was made aware of the investigation.
There is no known record of encounters between Routch and Epstein in Charleston, SC, after Routch's transfer there in February 2016.
The initial report was handled through DHS OIG and CBP internal channels before being escalated to the FBI.
